data.name: Sinoepoch
data.detailed_description:
Sinoepoch is a grand strategy game based on the historical fantasy of the Three Kingdoms period in Chinese history. In the current version, players can create their character, "travel" to the end of the Eastern Han Dynasty, run their own family, compete or cooperate with the heroes of the Three Kingdoms to conquer the world, create their family legends.

The amount of game text is huge, and the English version translation still needs to wait. It is recommended that non-Chinese players do not purchase for the time being.

Game Features

Realistic and Extra Large World Map


The game world is very large and drawn according to the real map. For historical locations, refer to the Atlas of Chinese History. The locations that players can reach are divided into 13 states, 103 counties, a total of 967 cities, and 8 Passes.

Numerous Historical Figures


There are 1,002 characters in the current version.

Family Business and Territory Management


The core of the game is running your family. Players create their characters and "travel" to the Three Kingdoms period in Chinese history. When the character dies, the player will control the descendants of the character to continue the game until the end time set by the scenario. If the player's control character has no descendants, the current control character dies and the game ends. So please get married and have children as soon as possible.
The current version of the scenario is 100 years long (It also takes 20 hours if you don't do anything to let time pass).
The starting point of a family is a city. Players can take over the world in troubled times by managing cities and recruiting troops.

The Game Between Organizations and Nations


All nations are organizations, but not all organizations are nations.
Organizations in the game also include political entities with different strengths, such as princes, warlords, separatists, tyrants, and tribes. Organizations can be attacked, alliances can be at their disposal, for players to be friends or defeat.

Character Progression and The Evolving World


In the game, there are as many as 18 character attributes, and various skills can be developed when gaining enough experience points.
There are also a large number of historical events and fictional historical events waiting for players to promote and witness.
However, none of the above are mandatory game goals, and players can experience the game at will.
The only objective that needs to be accomplished is to "pass the lineage" to ensure that the game continues.
